My Projects

xwOBA Predictive Model: For this project, I developed a model to predict the xwOBA for balls in play from the 2020-23 seasons using Launch Angle and Exit Velocity. My initial model was developed from the k-Nearest Neighbors method, but my second and more accurate model was a Random Forest model. 
https://github.com/Chris-Ayres/xwOBA-Model.git
